title: "ImageScalingMode"
---
<!-- DO NOT EDIT! This file was auto-generated by crates/re_types_builder/src/codegen/docs/mod.rs -->

Determines whether an image or texture should be scaled to fit the viewport.

## Variants

* Original
* Fill
* FillKeepAspectRatio
